sys_documentation.label: Have any required risk warnings been included? (where relevant)

sys_documentation.hint:
"E.g. Secured lending, Auto Contra Settlement, ownership of assets, end of contract conditions, maintenance responsibilities, excess mileage charge etc.
Risk warnings should be given equal prominence so that the promotion is ‘balanced’.
Only answer N/A if no risk warnings are required. "
